ygData.subject: Suggestion from my mailbox....
ygData.msgSnippet: Jiya.....I don t get the emails from this list as one big email, I get them as they come, that way I can read them all individually and remember them. BUT...i
ygData.messageBody:
Jiya.....I don't get the emails from this list as one big email, I get them
as they come, that way I can read them all individually and remember them.
BUT...i am having a problem with this. People who send about 30+ emails in
20 minutes....I check my mail about 2-3 times a day.....there is no need for
people to send a whole letter saying "LOL me too!" or "Wow..." and that's
it. I'll say on average I get about 200+ emails a day just from this list
alone. I don't want to un-subscribe from this list because it's EXTREMELY
helpful, and I love the discussions we get into. BUT....when I see the same
name come up on my screen 47 times in a row......I figured, why can't that
person just say what he had to say in one letter? Or even 10, I don't care!
But 47??!? It's extremely frustrating to check your email before you go to
work and you have 159 messages in your box, plus the 30 left over from last
night that you were too tired to read.
Ok, all I am saying is this.....could we please trim it a little bit? I
am not flaming anyone, and everyone on this list has given excellent
feedback and contributed to this list. So I am not trying to bitch, I just
wish it were a little less =]

Tyveris
